# У Стендап - Ukrainian Standup Comedy Club in Cologne

> Ukrainian standup comedy club based in Cologne (Köln), Germany. We organize standup shows, open mics, and weekly writing sessions in Ukrainian language.

## Quick Facts

- **Name**: У Стендап (U Standup)
- **Location**: Cologne (Köln), Germany
- **Language**: Ukrainian (primary), German and English (secondary)
- **Founded**: 2024
- **Type**: Non-profit comedy club / community

## What We Do

### Standup Shows
Professional standup comedy concerts featuring Ukrainian comedians living in Germany and Europe. Events typically held at Theatercafé Filmdose in Cologne.

### Open Mics (Відкриті мікрофони)
Free entry events where anyone can try standup comedy. Great for beginners and experienced comedians testing new material.

### Writing Sessions (Читки)
Weekly meetings where comedians work on their material together, give feedback, and improve their jokes.

## Contact & Social Media

- **Instagram**: https://www.instagram.com/u_standup_cologne/
- **WhatsApp Group**: https://chat.whatsapp.com/BXBNeksXPrJ29btgeo9BZZ
- **Website**: https://www.ustandup.club

## Typical Venue

**Theatercafé Filmdose**
Address: Zülpicher Str. 39, 50674 Köln, Germany

## Target Audience

- Ukrainians living in Germany/Europe who want to enjoy comedy in their native language
- People interested in trying standup comedy
- Anyone who wants to support Ukrainian culture and community abroad

## Related Clubs (Ukrainian Standup in Europe)

- Єстендпап Берлін (Berlin, Germany)
- UKROP (Warsaw, Poland)
- Stand up from UA (Tallinn, Estonia)
- ТЮ! (Barcelona, Spain)
- Стендап Простір (Wrocław, Poland)
- SUCK - Stand Up Club Krakow (Krakow, Poland)

## Events Data

For structured event data, see: https://www.ustandup.club/data/events.json

## FAQ

**Q: How can I perform at your open mic?**
A: Send us a direct message on Instagram or join our WhatsApp group.

**Q: Do I need experience to perform?**
A: No! We welcome complete beginners. Join our weekly writing sessions for support.

**Q: Is entrance free?**
A: Open mics are usually free or pay-what-you-can. Concerts have ticket prices (typically €10-15).

**Q: What language are the shows in?**
A: Primarily Ukrainian. Some comedians also perform in German or English.
